facts.INVENTION_TITLE: Method of facilitating shopping on a mobile device
facts.INVENTION_DESCRIPTION: Method of facilitating shopping on a mobile device
facts.CGK: mobile device connected to a server computer
facts.CPA: a method for facilitating shopping on a mobile device wherein the user selects a single product and the server determines from a database the vendor selling the selected product nearest to the user and transmits this information to the mobile device
ReliableTechnicalEffect_items: An "optimal shopping tour" for purchasing the two or more products is provided to the user
optimal shopping tour is determined by the server by accessing a cache memory
facts.ReliableTechnicalEffect_sub_adm_instance: {'user selects 2+ products': <ADM_Construction.ADM object at 0x7f8a46a94650>, 'An "optimal shopping tour" for purchasing the two or more products is provided to the user': <ADM_Construction.ADM object at 0x7f8a46a94d70>, 'optimal shopping tour is determined by the server by accessing a cache memory': <ADM_Construction.ADM object at 0x7f8a46a954f0>}
objective_technical_problems: how to modify the method of D1 to implement in a technically efficient manner the non-technical business concept defined by ifferences of a non-technical nature
OTPObvious_items: how to modify the method of D1 to implement in a technically efficient manner the non-technical business concept defined by ifferences of a non-technical nature
